outcomes_json: {"success": {"text": "你诚恳道歉并处理妥当，顾客情绪缓和，还愿意再给一次机会。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": -100}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": 5}, {"scope": "bag_weight", "target": {"bag_id": "customer_conflict"}, "op": "mul", "value": 0.8, "duration_turns": 4}, {"scope": "event_weight", "target": {"tags_any": ["投诉"]}, "op": "mul", "value": 0.7, "duration_turns": 4}]}, "fail": {"text": "顾客不接受解释，在社交媒体发帖吐槽，你的声誉受损。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": -10}, {"scope": "flag", "target": "customer_angry", "op": "add", "value": 1, "duration_turns": 6}]}}
